channel.title: kepler.gl on Ding Luo
channel.description: Recent content in kepler.gl on Ding Luo

item.title: Preparing GPS data for kepler.gl trip visualization
item.description: Over the past years I have been using kepler.gl more and more often for geospatial visualiztion. The reason is just simple: powerful, easy, fast. It serves as a perfect visualization tool for EDA tasks. Very often when I show the visualization to my stakeholders, especially those who are from the traditional business side, they are immediately impressed! In this post, I want to simply share some python scripts for preparing GPS trajectory data for kepler.
